documents.document: Nothing says a Saturday afternoon off like re-installing audio editing software!
@DocNaismith @ShelAlexander @ChallengeMTV Setting up my PVR now. I think MTV has a Rivals 1 marathon on right now if you need a fix
@criseyde Heyman, Dudleyz, RVD, Jericho, Bam Bam, Sabu, Storm, Malenko, maybe Douglas, Raven and Dreamer
@criseyde He'd be my headliner. Outside of Vince, he's the most influential person in modern wrestling.
@criseyde Personally I think they should do a class that is 100 per cent ECW
@criseyde Lance Storm, maybe Cornette or Mysterio? Outside chance Chavo? Malenko?
@criseyde I was so happy when they started selling Owens gym shorts
@Curt_Magurt1 @ChallengeMTV @ShelAlexander We can negotiate guest spots
As any of my friends know, I'm obsessed with @ChallengeMTV. Me & @ShelAlexander are putting that love into a podcast https://t.co/YWKrgF9qrb
Finally watching NXT TakeOver from San Antonio. I love that the Authors of Pain's names are an Occam's Razor pun
Are you ready for the 29th season of @ChallengeMTV? No? Then listen to me and @ShelAlexander's new podcast https://t.co/YWKrgF9qrb
Me and @ShelAlexander have come together like Voltron to do a podcast on the new season of @ChallengeMTV. Check it: https://t.co/YWKrgFr1PL
@WEMovement @CaraGeeeee Excellent Q&A and Cara you're beautiful in those pics!
Someone at the New York Times is not feeling the Super Bowl https://t.co/XaSQHRdJkl
Blade Mann-Dixon is the best name in all of junior hockey, right?
@criseyde @eatspecialk I was trying to explain that the New Day are right up her alley
It's that time of year where I catch myself saying things like "Man, the Lethbridge Hurricanes are really rolling right now..."
@VictoriaAhearn GIF game on point
And one of Canada's best amateur golfers! https://t.co/pRgx1gHNw6
@criseyde "that time he did a moonsault off of a fat guy"
@AdrianKLee so soon? Wasn't yesterday Black Tuesday?
@ADeMeltCTV Yes. It's ruined my life
@siomo in fairness, they are considered weapons of war
I'm about to get my first-ever filling but Sukhinder, my cab driver, was very reassuring. He said I shouldn't be scared
Too real. https://t.co/27chwcXQQw
@ShelAlexander Do it for Vethamany!
I'm collaborating on a project with @ShelAlexander for the first time since OAC Law. Can't wait for you guys to see what we're up to.
I love that they continue to call him Handsome Rusev #Raw
Theory: Braun Strowman is secretly Dewey Foley. It's why @RealMickFoley keeps giving him what he wants #Raw
Great work by my colleague @GregoryStrongCP speaking with @EppingJohn about the support he received after coming out https://t.co/OLhNFwjqrt
That said, thoughts and prayers only take you so far. It's important that we fight intolerance in all forms and learn to love our neighbours
Just this weekend I was talking about how much I love Quebec City. My thoughts and prayers are with those affected by last night's shooting
Chekhov's folding chair pyramid #RoyalRumble
@PaddyGurks heck yeah!
Can I please watch the WWE in their promo videos and no the one that's on Raw every week?
I'm rewatching trailers from the @ChallengeMTV and I'm getting so hype for the next season to start. It's going to be incredible
Congrats @ScottyMacThinks! One of my favourite guys in the press box. https://t.co/D0moH61YJI
@s_findlay Spend that money you earned working for free on more expensive envelopes
@RyanBMcKenna They're both from my constituency! Premier Wynne's kids went to Wanless and she ran the PTA, Mayor Tory attended Bedford Park
Kathleen Wynne v. John Tory. Battle of North Toronto! John Wanless v. Bedford Park! https://t.co/BoUvWB7PT8
@criseyde Hopefully some day they'll pull out of it. Until then... NXT!
@criseyde It's that damn 50-50 booking they use on Raw! NXT gets it right and stays PG. Owens and Joe were/are both effective heels on NXT
@criseyde Can the WWE bring back a competent heel of any kind on Raw? I'd love the Chris and Kevin run better if they were more devious
My mom just made a "cash me ow side" joke.
Ric Flair your entire life has been lit. https://t.co/vxo5cVhh0l
How mild is this winter? A woman in a halter top just walked by me at King and Portland
@CaraGeeeee Thanks cuz! Not just for the tweet, but all the love and support during some tough times.
@Christie_P83 Thanks Christie! I did the thing!
@CaraMcK I was scared to share this because I do feel that stigma, that it will be held against me. Thanks for sharing your story too!
@mich_mcq There definitely is a stigma too. I had one (now former) friend mock me for seeing a therapist. Being open helps end that stigma
@mich_mcq Thanks Michelle! I hope the tweets inspire someone to seek help themselves
@siomo Thanks SioMo! I appreciate the kind words. And confirmation that I'll always be the only Chud in your life.
@marygazze Thanks Mary! I appreciate the support. I was hesitant at first but my hope is that it helps someone else out
Anyway, back to jokes about wrestling, rap music, 1990s pop culture and bad puns.
@emathieuStar Thanks Emily! I appreciate the support. I was unsure if I should even post it but then said "what the hell!" and went for it
@RobsonDan Thanks Dan! It also taught me that our writing can affect people's lives in unexpected ways and that what we do has a real impact
There's lots to learn from my story. 1) Talking helps. 2) There are lots of resources out there 3) It will get better #BellLetsTalk 8/8
With her help, I've made incredible progress. I'm good 98 per cent of the time. The other two per cent I know how to deal #BellLetsTalk 7/?
But because of that book I saw how unhealthy, how toxic, I had become. So I started seeing a trauma counsellor #BellLetsTalk 6/?
But I hadn't told anyone how much it affected me. I told myself I was just grieving. I soldiered through. #BellLetsTalk 5/?
Y'see, my dad had dropped dead of a heart attack in Feb. 2013 and I had found his body four days later. It fucked me up. #BellLetsTalk 4/?
So I reached out to my therapist from when I was getting divorced and, in Dec. 2014, I was diagnosed with PTSD myself. #BellLetsTalk 3/?
As I read Malarchuk's story about his struggles with anxiety and PTSD I realized I had some similar symptoms #BellLetsTalk 2/?
Back in Oct. 2014 my buddy @RobsonDan wrote a book w/ Clint Malarchuk called The Crazy Game. I bought a copy at the launch 1/? #BellLetsTalk
@ThrowinSmoke I'll talk only if it's with Maddux
@nickacoates I can take your game to another level
@nickacoates I could have told you that
@JoePack Things that make you go hmmmm
This is an interesting move from the IIHF. https://t.co/SS4DMp71n0
I'm catching up on the Bachelor and here's my only question: is Corinne a sociopath or a psychopath? I'm leaning toward the former.
@Jackie_Redmond It's a good look for you
@s_findlay I just can't get over the guy's look. THAT was the most attractive teenage male in all of Ireland in 1998?
I'm teaching @eatspecialk about the wonders/horrors of B*Witched's C'est La Vie. That guy's belt is cinched SO tight https://t.co/a52Iess7no
@criseyde This article is what convinced me to change my habits About halfway down he starts explaining things https://t.co/NsSdISMnPY
@criseyde Squad! Squad! Squad! (do people still say that?) But, yeah, the no screens policy has made a huge difference for my insomnia
@marygazze If @Twitter wanted to make real money they'd let people edit their tweets for a monthly subscription fee
@criseyde Also, thanks for following me back!
@criseyde I've made a point of not looking at a computer or TV screen for at least an hour before bed. It's made a huge difference
@MrBrandonStroud @sundownmotel @YouTube I don't remember it at all and this is the first I've heard of it. But I kinda like it?
@marygazze that makes sense! It's just weird to me because it's the worst time for Hollywood
I can't tell you how badly I wish their theme songs played https://t.co/xlhwx2Bayn
Serious question: why do they announce Oscar nominations so damn early?
"Whatever you do, make sure Roman looks really strong," - CM Punk
@jphoornstra It was custom made! Has MEXICO stitched on over top of the Vick paint letters
@elrines it was a gag gift where someone had made me a Ron Mexico jersey https://t.co/JQMAta1kCc
@the_Zubes pretty sure they're deployed whenever I'm running late for work
The good news is I own an Atlanta Falcons jersey. The bad news is it says MEXICO on the back
@the_Zubes Queen's Quay streetcars are going to take years off my life
This is, officially, the most I've liked the Patriots. Ever. https://t.co/PNPqYmPK8Z
Tweeting this is the best thing I've done today. RT it and make it the best thing you do today. hoodclips's video https://t.co/2yqaIqbjxL
@tyler_harper could you please at least change your team name to the EDM Oilers
@tyler_harper This is the darkest timeline
@s_findlay most importantly, Just Blaze retweeted it himself
Started my day at work with a phone call to @erik_read. Here was the result https://t.co/2ve2wGnYD8
@tyler_harper Team Rocket tho https://t.co/ejUA8GIZAf
This was really cool! Can't wait to see more https://t.co/qYLAcEioOo
@WongSN590 too bad it's overshadowing the Revival calling TM61 tilapia
@siomo I'm pretty sure if more than 50 people are together one spontaneously appears
There are rumours the Oilers are going to experiment with cloning. They're going to be Letes-tube babies.
I got to speak with @JDufourLapointe, @MikaelKingsbury and @andi_naude this afternoon after their banner day on the… https://t.co/taCTbWjB8r
